bioconda.name: bioconductor-chromdraw
bioconda.summary: chromDraw is a R package for drawing the schemes of karyotypes in the linear and circular fashion.

biotools.summary: R package for drawing the schemes of karyotype(s) in the linear and circular fashion that can visualize cytogenetic marsk on the chromosomes. This tool has its own input data format that can be imported from the GenomicRanges data structure. This package can visualize the data in the BED file format.

bioschemas.name: chromDraw
bioschemas.summary: R package for drawing the schemes of karyotype(s) in the linear and circular fashion that can visualize cytogenetic marsk on the chromosomes. This tool has its own input data format that can be imported from the GenomicRanges data structure. This package can visualize the data in the BED file format.
